item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Hahaha Thanks again, Figures why they weren’t talking lmao. :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2008, 09:51:01 am[/size][hr]Errr… Actually, i still get the “Ellse without If” Error, what do i do now lol?

NPCHandler.java:981: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ NPCHandler.java:993: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I have two different NPC’s by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: The code still doesn't work, Please Help again
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Haha, I missed something, sorry. Replace it with;

if (npcs[i].npcType == 534) { if (misc.random(10) < 4) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Xile 0wner")); { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The Owner, Xile 0wner is Online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The Owner, Xile 0wner is Offline! =("; } } }

item.title: The code still doesn't work, Please Help again
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Hey everyone, I’ve been trying to make the Fairy Trader say if im online or offline, but everytime i put the code in NPCHandler I get 100 Errors.

This is the code i enter:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 534) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // This is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Xile 0wner")); { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The Owner, Xile 0wner is Online!"; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 534) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "The Owner, Xile 0wner is Offline! =("; } } }

When i put this code it gives me this Error:

NPCHandler.java:982: 'else' without 'if' } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 534) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

But i get the 100 Errors if i get rid of the “IF” or the “}” right before it.
Can anyone please help me?, Thanks.
I tried searching for it in the search bar, but i couldn’t find any answers… Sorry.

EDIT -

I put the new code you gave me, but I still get the " ‘Else’ without ‘If’ Error" What do i do now?
Thanks.

Read full topic
